unnormalised: Crop insurance, yaar, a real lifesaver for farmers like Ramlal in Maharashtra! Heard claims paid out quickly after the 2023 floods. Still, paperwork is a pain. My uncle got his payout delayed after applying on 26/01/2024. Should be smoother, like online at 14:00 hrs sharp. What about Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana? Heard good things, but coverage needs improving in UP. 02/10 is Gandhi Jayanti- let’s hope for policies benefiting all, not just a few. Rs.5000 is often not enough though!
normalised: Crop insurance, yaar, a real lifesaver for farmers like Ramlal in Maharashtra! Heard claims paid out quickly after the two thousand and twenty three floods. Still, paperwork is a pain. My uncle got his payout delayed after applying on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four. Should be smoother, like online at fourteen hundred hours sharp. What about Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana? Heard good things, but coverage needs improving in U P. second october is Gandhi Jayanti- let’s hope for policies benefiting all, not just a few. Rupee five thousand is often not enough though!
